overlay.p: &dactyl.appName; 是一个 &dactyl.host; 免费扩展,设计用于更高效地浏览网页,尤其可以更多地用到键盘.它很大程度上受启于 Vim 文本编辑器,所以其外观与指感对 Vim 用户来说应该很熟悉.

ol.li: 快速入门教程: 为新入用户准备的快速入门教程.
启动 &dactyl.appName;: &dactyl.appName; 如何启动,在哪个位置读取的配置文件,等等.
网页浏览: 网页浏览所需的基本键映射与命令(怎样打开网页,在历史中后退,等等.)
Buffer: Operations on the current document (scrolling, copying text, etc.)
命令行模式: 命令行的编辑.
文本编辑: 文本区域与输入域的编辑.
选项: 所有选项绍介.
文本搜索命令: 在当前缓冲器搜索文本.
标签页: 管理你的标签式网页浏览会话.
Hints: 选择超链接或其他页面元素.
键盘快捷键与命令.: 定义新的键映射,缩略词与用户命令.
Expression evaluation: 执行 JavaScript. Executing JavaScript.
Marks: Using bookmarks, QuickMarks, history and local marks.
Repeating commands: Using macros to repeat recurring workflows.
自动化命令.: 在特定事件上自动执行代码命令.
打印: 打印页面.
&dactyl.appName; 图形用户界面: 访问 &dactyl.host; 菜单,对话框和侧边栏.
样式化图形用户界面和网页: 更改内容页面及 &dactyl.appName; 本身的样式.
Error and informational messages: A description of informational and error messages.
隐私及敏感信息: 浏览时如何管理你的隐私数据.
开发者信息: 如何编写插件及文档.
其余命令: 其余无法归入其他类别的帮助内容.
插件: 你所安装的任何插件的使用文档.
FAQ: 常见问答.
版本信息: A detailed list of differences between each of the released versions of &dactyl.appName;.
Index: An index of all commands and options.

ul.li: Vim-like key bindings (h, j, gg, ZZ, , etc.)
Powerful tab completion for all commands and options
Page search with many fixes for long-standing Firefox annoyances
Quick and powerful keyboard navigation for links, input fields, etc.
Keyboard macros, along with custom key mappings and commands
Minimal GUI, along with commands to hide and toggle toolbars and menus
Ability to :source JavaScript, CSS, and &dactyl.appName; command files
Ability to mark the current page position and return to it
Count support for many commands (3 will go back 3 pages)
Marks support (mM to set mark M, 'M to jump to it)
Editing of text fields with an external editor
AutoCommands to execute actions on certain events
A comprehensive help system, explaining all commands, mappings, options, and plugins
